text: Justin Bibb (born April 26, 1987) is an American nonprofit leader, businessman and politician. He is the Mayor of Cleveland since 2022. He is the co-chair of Teach for America. In January 2021, Bibb announced his candidacy for Cleveland Mayor in the 2021 election. He was elected in a landslide victory in November, becoming Cleveland's 4th African American mayor.https://www.cleveland.com/cityhall/2021/11/justin-bibb-wins-cleveland- mayoral-election-in-dominating-fashion-over-kevin-kelley-to-succeed-frank- jackson.html During his tenure as mayor of Cleveland Bibb has developed a reputation for not disclosing information to the media regarding important municipal inquiries. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Cleveland Category:American political activists Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Mayors of Cleveland Category:African-American politicians
title: Justin Bibb
